refnamediv.refpurpose: Determines whether or not referees are visible in formatted output

refsect1.title: Applies To
refsect1.para: This parameter controls the formatting of the referee element in all output formats.

refsect1.title: Possible Values
refsect1.para: Possible values include 1 (display referees) and 0 (display alternate text).

listitem.para: Referees are displayed in formatted output.
The text of the referees.hidden.phrase parameter (default: Available upon request.) is displayed in place of referees.
